member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.Interfaces.ILogger.Log(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message to the console.
member.param: Optional author of the message, defaults to null.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.Interfaces.ILogger.LogWarning(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the console.
member.param: Optional author of the message, defaults to null.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.Interfaces.ILogger.LogError(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the console.
member.param: Optional author of the message, defaults to null.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.Interfaces.ILogger.LogDebug(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a debug message to the console.
member.param: Optional author of the message, defaults to null.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.ModException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ModException class.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.ModException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ModException class with a specified error message. The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.ModException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ModException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.ModException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ModException class with a specified error message and custom mod-related information.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The ID of the mod that caused the exception.
A custom error code associated with the mod load failure.

member.name: M:JaLoader.Common.ModException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ModException class with serialized data.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
